text: واتخذوا۟ من دون الله ءالهة لعلهم ينصرون

translations.translation: They have taken gods besides Allah so that perhaps they may be helped.
And take other gods apart from God that they may perhaps give them help.
They set up deities apart from Allah, hoping that they will receive help from them.
They chose idols besides God in the hope of receiving help from them, but they will not be able to help them.
And they have appointed Gods other than Allah, that perhaps they may be helped!
And they have taken besides Allah, gods, hoping that they might be helped.
And they have taken gods besides Allah that they may be helped.
Yet they have taken, apart from God, gods; haply they might be helped.
And they have taken (other) gods beside Allah, in order that they may be helped.
They have set up other gods besides God, hoping to be helped by them,
And they have taken beside Allah gods, hoping that haply they may be succoured.
They have taken gods besides Allah, [hoping] that they might be helped [by the fake deities].
Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah, (hoping) that they might be helped!
And they have taken besides Allah aliha (gods), hoping that they might be helped (by those so called gods).
And yet they have taken gods, other than Allah, so that they might helped!
Yet they have taken to themselves gods other than God, that perhaps they may be helped.
But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.

[36:74] And they have taken besides God, in other words, other than Him, [other] gods, idols, which they worship, that perhaps they might be helped, protected against God’s chastisement by their gods’ interceding for them, as they are wont to claim.
(And they have) and the disbelievers of Mecca worshipped ((other) gods) idols (beside Allah, in order that they may be helped) so that they may save them from Allah's punishment.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ونسيانهم حقوق كرمه أنهم { ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ } الواحد الأحد الصمد
 المستقل بالألوهية والربوبية أولياء وسموهم { آلِهَةً } مستحقة للعبادة والرجوع في المهمات وكشف الملمات { لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ } [يس: 74] بهم وبشفاعتهم عن بأس الله وبطشه مع أنهم لكونهم جمادات { لاَ يَسْتَطِيعُونَ } ولا يقدرون { نَصْرَهُمْ } أي: نصر عابديهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { واتخذوا من دون الله آلهةٌ } أشركوها معه في العبادة
 بعدما رأوا منه تلك القدرة الباهرة
 والنعم المتظاهرة
 وتحقّقوا أنه المنفرد بها
 فعبدوا الأصنام
 { لعلهم يُنصَرُون } بها إذا حزبهم أمْرٌ
 والأمر بالعكس
